column2: "My request is about the Tundra this time, senpai. The target is a Native called Malmoth."
"They shouldn't be that dangerous, but they fight equally well at close- and long-range. It's... too much for me to get my head around."
"But I don't want to be weak any more. I don't want this to beat me."
"So, that's where you come in. Show me how to defeat these things with a Just Attack."
